---
title: "Contact"
---

*[Accredited Swiss Higher Education Institutions](https://www.swissuniversities.ch/en/topics/studying/accredited-swiss-higher-education-institutions-1)* are strongly encouraged to join the project and to actively contribute.

Other *Swiss Higher Education Institutions* and *research institutes* are welcome to join the project and to actively contribute.

Synergies with *additional stakeholders* at the national and international level are also welcome.

If you would like to join the project, please **[fill out the form](https://forms.gle/hAQwHaitKDZ3Cf846)**.

To provide feedback or to ask questions, please **[contact us](mailto:naif@library.ethz.ch)**.
